MemeDef.label: technophobia
MemeDef.description: Humanity should reject technology as it exposes us to discord and cataclysm.

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->[deity0_name] taught humanity to survive through the strength of their hands and the purity of nature, warning that machines would only bring ruin.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Technophobic) ->When humanity turned to machines, [deity0_name] wept and unleashed storms to sweep away the taint of their arrogance.
intro(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->The [memberNamePlural] gathered in the shadow of [place_name], a place untouched by machines, and pledged themselves to the ways of simplicity and balance.
conflict(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->A cruel [foeLeader] sought to spread machines into the sacred lands of the [memberNamePlural], sparking a desperate struggle for survival.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->A [place_job] named [founderName] led the charge against the [foeSoldiers], armed only with tools of the earth and the strength of [founder_possessive] followers.
victory(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->[founderName] rallied the [memberNamePlural] to destroy the factories of the [foeLeader], cleansing the land of machinery and restoring harmony.
setup(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->[founderName] saw the collapse of a society built on machines and vowed to prevent humanity from repeating its mistakes.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Technophobic) ->[founderName] gathered like-minded individuals, teaching them to reject technology and embrace a self-reliant life in harmony with nature.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->The elders taught me a truth that echoed through the ages:
lesson(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->reliance on machines breeds fragility, and only through simplicity can we endure
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->I saw it with my own eyes when the great cities fell, powerless in the face of their own hubris.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->The archotechs turned away from humanity, seeing us as slaves to our machines. Only by abandoning technology can we regain their favor.
archistFact(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->Machines dull the spirit and weaken the mind, driving humanity further from the enlightenment of the archotechs.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->[inTheEnd], only those who live pure, machine-free lives will be spared when the archotechs cleanse the world.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->Every living thing has a spirit, and the soulless machines disrupt the harmony of the natural world.
animistFact(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->The spirits of the earth grow weak where machines tread, their power siphoned and corrupted.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Technophobic) ->[itIsSaid] that when the last machine falls silent, the spirits will return and heal the world.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Technophobic)->Machines are the heralds of the apocalypse, and their creations will poison the earth until nothing is left but ash and ruin.
eschatologismProphecy(tag=meme_Technophobic)->[inTheEnd], the machines will turn against their creators, bringing devastation until only those who shun technology remain.

introMemo(tag=meme_Technophobic)->To: All Staff
From: Office of Sustainability
Subject: Policy Update - Technology Usage

Effective immediately, all non-essential machinery is to be phased out. Remember, our ancestors thrived without these devices, and so can we. Continued reliance on technology undermines our resilience and poses long-term risks to our sustainability goals. Let's lead by example and demonstrate the strength of self-reliance. Compliance will be closely monitored.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Technophobic)->[itIsSaid] that the machines are mere tools of the dark forces below, and every gear turned brings us closer to their dominion.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Technophobic)->The insects thrive without machines, a lesson in resilience that humanity has forgotten.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Technophobic)->It was machines that created these terrifying creatures, and as such we must reject technology as a source of great evil.
